tags.name: umb-button-ellipsis
tags.description:
### Umbraco button ellipsis 

 Usage: 

 ```html 
 <umb-button-ellipsis 
    action='{callback}' 
    text='{string}' 
    [label-key='{string}'] 
    [css-class='{string}'] 
    [color='{string}'] 
    [show-text='{boolean}'] 
    [element='{string}'] 
    [state='{string}'] 
    [mode='{string}']>
</umb-button-ellipsis> 
 ```

attributes.name: action
attributes.description:
Callback when the value of the checkbox changes through interaction. 

 Type: `callback function`

attributes.name: text
attributes.description:
Set the text for the checkbox label. 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: label-key
attributes.description:
Set a dictionary/localization string for the checkbox label. 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: css-class
attributes.description:
Set a css class modifier. 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: color
attributes.description:
Set a hex code e.g. `#f5c1bc`. `#000000` by default. 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: show-text
attributes.description:
Set to `true` to show the text. `false` by default 

 Type: `boolean`

attributes.name: element
attributes.description:
Highlights a DOM element (HTML selector) 

 Example: `my-div-name` 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: state
attributes.description:
Set the initial state of the component. To have it hidden use `hidden` 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: mode
attributes.description:
Set the mode which decides how to style the component. 

 Options: `small`, `tab` 

 Type: `string`

references.name: Umbraco API Docs V8 > Umbraco button directive `umbButtonEllipsis`
